column4: How do I know if I have the most updated NVIDIA drivers? I installed the ones that were in the restricted driver manager
also, how do I get more resolutions? I only have a max of 1024x768, but I have widescreen monitor
backup xorg.conf, then do gksudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf, find the horiz/vert sections, edit to your monitor's specs
if you didn't, you would get some nice updates
